A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Forced political agenda.
No answers just more questions.
Most interesting new character is thrown away so emo Kylo can become the big bad.
Rose falls in love with Finn in under 10 hours? like what the actual......
All interesting concepts set up in TFA was brushed aside for this movie and it did not deliver. The first enjoyable part of the movie was when Yoda showed up and the scene in the throne room had a cool fighting scene I guess. Leia should have died. Captain Phasma was brought back just to be killed 2 minutes later. I'm so done. At this point they should just make a old republic trilogy and stay away from this era they are only making it worse and worse.
